alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norfolk; Northern Bristol; Suffolk; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 1:18PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Norfolk, southwestern Suffolk, southeastern Worcester, south central Middlesex, northwestern Plymouth and north central Bristol Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 117 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Westborough, or near Shrewsbury, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Boston, Brockton, Quincy, Framingham, Braintree, Shrewsbury, Natick, Randolph, Franklin, Needham, Norwood, Milford, Wellesley, Milton, Stoughton, Dedham, Walpole, Mansfield, Easton and Canton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norfolk; Northern Bristol; Suffolk; Western Plymouth
